signup.confirmEmailDescription: We sent a 6 digit code to {{email}}. Please enter it below to confirm your email.
signup.confirmPhoneNumberDescription: We sent a 6 digit code to {{phoneNumberPrefix}}{{phoneNumber}}. Please enter it below to confirm your phone number.
signup.sendSmsFirst: You need to send the SMS first

1.title: Look for the best datasets for your Company
1.body: Our platform provides a robust marketplace where data consumers and producers can interact seamlessly. Buy and sell high-quality datasets securely, enhancing AI capabilities with diverse and reliable data sources.

2.title: Get unique datasets for your LLM
2.body: Producers respond to market demands, set competitive prices, and earn DedoAI tokens. Our blockchain technology ensures secure transactions and fair compensation.

3.title: Your data are Decentralized and Secured
3.body: Leverage blockchain technology for a truly distributed data ecosystem. Our decentralized architecture ensures no single point of failure, enhancing data integrity and resilience against censorship.
